metadata.Title: CVE-2021-36769 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: A reordering issue exists in Telegram before 7.8.1 for Android, Telegram before 7.8.3 for iOS, and Telegram Desktop before 2.8.8. An attacker can cause the server to receive messages in a different order than they were sent a client.

criterions.comment: telegram-desktop package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
